definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality

pinyin: bian4 zheng4 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4
li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: Relationalism is the essence of practical materialism and Piagets theory.
sentences.chinese: 關係論是實踐唯物主義和皮亞傑學說的精華。
對名詞性物主代詞進行總結。

sentences.english: The creator God really is God.
sentences.chinese: 造物主上帝是真正的上帝。

sentences.english: The result of a demiurge's act of creation is a Progenitor, the prototype Promethean of a Lineage.
sentences.chinese: 造物主的作品就被稱爲先祖，也是該世系的原型。

sentences.english: The three leaps in materialist view of interests give rise to the three improvements of development view.
sentences.chinese: 唯物主義利益觀的三次飛躍促成了發展觀的三次提升。

sentences.english: You are also One with Creator.
sentences.chinese: 您也是與制物主開一的“一”。

sentences.english: If the human body's obscene, complain to the manufacturer, not to me.
sentences.chinese: 如果說人體是骯髒不堪的，向造物主去抱怨，別找我。

sentences.english: This is the prerogative and knowledge of the Creator Sons, and the Universe Mothers.
sentences.chinese: 這是造物主之子和宇宙之母的特權與知識。

sentences.english: I have felt like playing the abiotic God.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經想過要扮演一次造物主上帝。

sentences.english: I cannot bear it, and can no longer adore my Creator.
sentences.chinese: 我無法忍受了，我再也不會崇敬造物主了。

sentences.english: He denied doing any harm to the owner.
Nature has cunningly designed them to be irresistible.
sentences.chinese: 造物主巧妙地把他們設計得令人無法抗拒。

sentences.english: The Creator is a mighty and powerful essence of all-encompassing love.
sentences.chinese: 造物主是所有一切愛的偉大而有力量的本質。

sentences.english: The dialectical materialism philosophic thought is generally implied in theory and practice of accounting.
sentences.chinese: 會計理論和實踐中普遍滲透着辨證唯物主義哲學思想。

sentences.english: Thinkers with such views were called materialists .
sentences.chinese: 持這種觀點的思想家被稱爲唯物主義者。

sentences.english: It knows that even the least breath is a gesture of gratitude to the Creator.
sentences.chinese: 它知道甚至是最微弱的呼吸也是對造物主的一種感激。

definition: to deposit/to store/to leave sth with sb
to receive for storage/delivery of goods/to gather and store/to store safely/safe keeping
to store/to have sth in storage
to be short of the full amount
rime dictionary (ancient type of Chinese dictionary that collates characters by tone and rhyme rather than by radical)
to steal (including identity theft, credit card fraud or theft of computer account)/to misappropriate
to rely on/to base oneself on
Guliang Annals, commentary on the Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], first published during the Han Dynasty
to ask a price/to charge/asking price
